description: Concentration driven historical forcing with land use held constant at 1850 usage.  Same as the concentration diriven CMIP6 historical experiment except with LULCC held constant at pre-industrial conditions. Additional ensemble members are requested with tier 2 priority.
keywords: LUMIP, Tier 1, Tier 2, Historical, pre-industrial Land Use and Land Cover, 1850 LULCC
rationale: Land-use change impact on past climate.

requirements.keywords: 1850, 2014, Historical, Recent Past, pre-industrial to present, IPCC
requirements.label: 1850-2014 165yrs

requirements.description: Maintain 1850 irrigated area.  Irrigation amounts within the irrigated area are allowed to change.
requirements.label: 1850 Irrigation

requirements.description: Maintain 1850 wood harvest amounts/areas. Wood harvest due to land deforestation for agriculture should continue yielding non-zero anthropogenic product pools.
requirements.label: 1850 Wood Harvest

requirements.description: Maintain 1850 levels of fire management (anthropogenic ignition and suppression of fire). If ignitions are based on population density, maintain constant population density.
requirements.label: 1850 Fire Management

requirements.description: Forcing data for concentration-driven historical CMIP6 runs. Here, we provide an outline of a consolidated set of atmospheric concentration time series for the long-lived greenhouse-gases, including CO2, CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, several ODS, and NF3 to serve as input for the CMIP6 Historical simulations.
requirements.keywords: Historical, Well Mixed Greenhouse Gas, WMGHG
requirements.label: Historical WMGHG Concentrations

requirements.description: Mass mixing ratio fields at 1x1 degree resolution for main aerosol components (sulphate, black carbon, organic carbon, nitrate, sea salt, mineral dust),  along with effective radius per species.
requirements.label: Historical Aerosol Forcing

requirements.canonical_name: Historical O3 and Stratospheric H2O Concentrations
requirements.description: An ozone concentration database encompassing both the stratosphere and the troposphere and a stratospheric water vapour concentration database.
requirements.keywords: Historical, stratospheric, ozone, water vapour, O3, H2O, concentration
requirements.label: Historical O3 and Stratospheric H2O Concentrations

requirements.description: Apply historical stratospheric aerosol concentrations from the stratospheric aerosol data set (SADS Version 2)
requirements.label: Historical Stratospheric Aerosol

requirements.description: Solar forcing of the Earth system consistent with historical observations.
requirements.keywords: Historical, Solar, Forcing, SSI, TSI, Proton Forcing, Electron Forcing
requirements.label: Historical Solar Forcing

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model
requirements.label: AOGCM Configuration

requirements.description: All applicable land management active in the model configuration.
requirements.keywords: LUMIP, all land management, Grassland, Fire, Wood Harvest, Pasture, Crop, Irrigation, Fertilisation
requirements.label: All Land Management Active
